course_details: Learn  basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to kickstart  web development .
Explore data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization techniques in Python and master data science.
Learn about the basics of cybersecurity and securing computer systems and apply it in real life world with security protocol.
Master OOP with the knowledge of classes, objects, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism. .
Explore  algorithmic techniques for problem-solving with sorting ,search ,dynamic programming, and graph algorithms.
Discover the principles of graphic design, including typography and layout.
Dive into the world of AI with topics like neural networks and NLP.
Get started with C programming, with the basics of C, including syntax, data types, control structures, and functions.
Master database design and SQL query language for data management.
